item.title: BMW E39: Navigation System Upgrades: (Computer, Display, Software, Maps)
item.description: In this article, I discuss in detail the steps, hardware, and software required to upgrade your BMW’s navigation computer, display, software, and maps. The information in this article is only applicable to BMWs that speak the same electronics ‘language’. Many BMW models and series speak this same language, utilize the same connectors, and make use of the same hardware-software interface. Applicable Vehicles: E38 7-series (1994-2001) E46 3-series (1999-2006) E39 5-series (1996-2003) E53 X5 (2000-2006) E83 X3 (2004-2010) *It is important to note that in order to upgrade your navigation system, you must first have a navigation system from factory.
